item.title: OpenAI releases ‘largest, most knowledgable’ model GPT-4.5 with reduced hallucinations and high API price
item.description: The API pricing appears shockingly high, costing developers $75 and $180 for 1 million tokens in and out, respectively.

item.title: PlayerUnknown Productions reveals trailer for emergent open-world survival game
item.description: PUBG creator Brendan Greene is back with a trailer for Prologue: Go Wayback, which will hit Steam early access this summer.

item.title: Qodo’s open code embedding model sets new enterprise standard, beating OpenAI, Salesforce
item.description: The 1.5B-parameter Qodo-Embed-1-1.5B is available on Hugging Face under the OpenRAIL++-M license, allowing developers to integrate it freely

item.title: Ampere accelerates expansion into telecom networking processors
item.description: Ampere is accelerating its expansion from Arm-based server processors for AI processing into networking chips for the telecom market.

item.title: You.com unveils AI research agent that processes 400+ sources at once
item.description: You.com launches ARI, a cutting-edge AI research agent that processes over 400 sources in minutes, revolutionizing market research and empowering fast...
